name: Bubble Slash Bash!
description: Bubble Slash Bash! is the first game I have ever developed. I created it over the summer for an introductory game development course at my college. The goal of the game is to last as long as possible, popping bubbles to increase your time and score. Make sure to read the dialogue at the start until you understand how to play the game. You can skip it with by pressing F on subsequent plays.
